resources.string: Written in Arles in 1888. Bought them the only one the artist who agreed to come to him - Paul Gauguin.
(1853 – 1890) Dutch post-impressionist painter, whose works had a timeless influence on 20th century painting.
This is a letter to someone
Great, the bug has gone away
What should the curtains be hooked on?
Let the bug out the window
Actions give rise to art, but what kind, and what type?..
Van Gogh arrives in Arles. He invites several artists here for the joint development of a new direction.
Only Paul Gauguin agrees to come …
Van Gogh is so grateful to him that he decides to decorate his room with still lifes with sunflowers.…
Complete the level to find out information about the artist, whose life is partially described in the level.
Complete the level to find out what picture the artist of this level painted.
This is a real still life!
What kind of place is it?
The next level is coming soon ))
